name: Pep&Pop
description:
this is a game made for Lost Relic Game Jam

The Game inspired from ibb and obb

https://store.steampowered.com/app/95400/ibb__obb/

had the same idea

Control

Pep Control

Move Left : Left arrow

Move Right : Right arrow

Jump : Right Shift or E

Pop Control

Move Left : A

Move Right : D

Jump : Q

Hope you Like the game and enjoy and tell me if you like the game and Preview the game
